TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GenerateDeploymentManifest extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateManifestBase

Docs.summary: Implements the `GenerateDeploymentManifest` task. Use the `GenerateDeploymentManifest` element in the project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see [GenerateDeploymentManifest Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets whether an icon is created on the desktop during ClickOnce application installation.
Docs.value: if an icon is created on the desktop during installation; otherwise.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the update location for the application.
Docs.value: The update location for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If this property is not specified, no update location is defined for the application. However, if the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> property is `true`, an update location must be specified. The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or UNC path.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the application should be run automatically when it is opened through a URL.
Docs.value: if the application can only be started from the **Start** menu; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default value is `false`. This property applies only when the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A> property value is `true`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the Web page that is displayed in dialog boxes during ClickOnce installations.
Docs.value: A string that represents the URL of a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Specifies a Web page to be displayed in dialog boxes that are displayed during ClickOnce installations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Type GetObjectType() cil managed

Docs.summary: To be added.
Gets or sets a Boolean that indicates whether the application is an installed application or an online-only application.
Docs.value: if the application is to be installed on the local computer and can be removed by using the **Add or Remove Programs** dialog box; if the application is for online use from a Web page.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the .deploy file name extension mapping is used.
Docs.value: if every program file is published with a .deploy file name extension; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use this option for Web server security to limit the number of file name extensions that must be unblocked to enable [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application deployment. The default value is `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the user can skip the update.
Docs.value: if the user can skip the update; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If a user has a version that is earlier than the minimum requirement, he cannot skip the update. This input only applies when the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A> property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool OnManifestLoaded(class Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest manifest) cil managed

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool OnManifestResolved(class Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest manifest) cil managed

Docs.summary: To be added.
Gets or sets the name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If this property is not specified, the name is inferred from the identity of the generated manifest. This name is used for the shortcut name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in the **Add or Remove Programs** dialog box.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the publisher of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If this property is not specified, the name is inferred from the registered user, or the identity of the generated manifest. This name is used for the folder name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in the **Uninstall or change a program** dialog box.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the folder on the **Start** menu where the application is located after ClickOnce deployment.
Docs.value: A string that represents the name of a **Start** menu folder.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the link that appears in the **Uninstall or change a program** dialog box for the application. The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or UNC path.
Docs.value: The link that appears in the **Uninstall or change a program** dialog box for the application.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether URL query-string parameters should be made available to the application.
Docs.value: if URL query-string parameters should be made available to the application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default value is `false`, which indicates that parameters will not be available to the application.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the application is enabled for updates.
Docs.value: if the application is enabled for updates; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default value is `false`. This property only applies when the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A> property is `true`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the update interval for the application.
Docs.value: The update interval for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default value is zero. This property only applies when the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> properties are both `true`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether updates should be checked. Updates can be checked before the application is started (in the foreground), or when the application is running (in the background).
Docs.value: if updates should be checked; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property can have the following values:
- `Foreground` (before the application is started)
- `Background` (when the application is running)
The default value is `Background`. This property only applies when the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> properties are both `true`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the time unit for the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateInterval%2A> property.
Docs.value: The time unit for the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateInterval%2A> property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This parameter can have the following values:
- `Hours`
- `Days`
- `Weeks`
This property only applies when the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> properties are both `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance bool ValidateInputs() cil managed

Docs.summary: To be added.
